Title: Three O'Clock High
Plot: A nerd gets himself in hot water with the new bully, a quiet bad boy who challenges him to fight on the grounds of their high school after the day's end.
Tagline: Jerry Mitchell just bumped into Buddy Revell. Now Jerry isn't thinking about math or english. Because at three o'clock, he's history.
Stars: Casey Siemaszko, Annie Ryan, Richard Tyson
